title: 天皇賞（春）の後に・敗北後と次の夢

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: First place goes to Rice Shower!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa, haa...
Ah. Still not good enough.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
...!
So many smiling faces...!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I did it, I did it,
Rice could do it too...!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Rice-san.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Congratulations.
It was a wonderful race.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Bourbon-san...!
*sob*!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, I still wasn't good enough.
This is just the beginning.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
More than anything, Rice-san, you were amazing.
Running with you gave me chills!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
The road ahead might still be long,
but I'll do my best to win someday!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer A
text_block_list.text:
I see!
Thank you for the positive comment!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer A
text_block_list.text:
By the way,
have you decided on your next target race?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Well... I'm thinking I'd like to run
on another big stage like this next time.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
It might be a bit tough,
but I'm hoping to run in the 'Takarazuka Kinen'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'll do my best to win next time!

And so,
the next race was decided to be the 'Takarazuka Kinen'.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huu...
The morning track is so quiet.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, the 'Takarazuka Kinen' is 2200m turf,
right-handed, right? That means——
Haaahhh――!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Hah, hah...!
Not yet...!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I must grow big like Rice-san and Tannhauser-san too...!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Until I unleash my frustration from the 'Tenno Sho (Spring)' into the 'Takarazuka Kinen'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Amazing...
McQueen is sparkling...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mmm. Alright, I have to do my best too...!
The days of running hard toward the mid-distance G1 race 'Takarazuka Kinen' in two months began!
